none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2023-02-birthspasm/extracted/Birth Spasm/08 Industrial Society And Its Future
Birth Spasm - Industrial Society And Its Future
Birth Spasm - Industrial Society And Its Future

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on February 23, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Where the fukk did this even come from...? It physically came from San Diego but cosmically speaking here: where the fukk did this even come from?! A precision attack in eight sharp movements, without even the slightest whiff of bullshit. It's from the crew of folks responsible for SLUMS OF THE FUTURE, so it's not like I'm surprised that it's good - but maybe I'm a little taken aback that it's this good. Anxious modern hardcore with obvious early century roots. Way into it. INDUSTRIAL SOCIETY AND ITS FUTURE
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2019/02/slums-of-future.html
